DOC.brief_summary: It aim evaluate treatment result , rate success complication , injury give kidney measure preoperative postoperative blood Cystatin C level patient kidney stone small 2 cm undergo either ultra-mini percutaneous nephrolithotripsy ( PCNL ) micro PCNL .
DOC.detailed_description: In study , demographic preoperative data , image data , operative data postoperative follow-up data prospectively record accord patient information form patient kidney stone small 2 cm undergo either ultra-mini PCNL micro PCNL . A total 60 ( sixty ) patient , age 18 65 year , similar stone size location plan enrol study ; prospectively randomize two group 1:1 ratio , thus 30 ( thirty ) patient receive ultra-mini PCNL 30 ( thirty ) patient undergo micro PCNL . Preoperatively , blood urine Cystatin C level measure . After surgery , blood urine Cystatin C level postoperative 12th hour record . Besides , classical kidney function test , namely blood urea creatinine level , measure preoperatively postoperatively . Parameters list also record evaluate : 1 . Preoperative general evaluation data : Age , height , weight , body-mass index , concomitant comorbidities , prescription use , history operation ( ) , American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) score 2 . Preoperative urological evaluation data : History extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy ( ESWL ) /PCNL/ureterorenoscopy ( URS ) /retrograde intrarenal surgery ( RIRS ) /open surgery , whole blood count , kidney function test , automatic urine test , urine culture , preoperative imaging modality ( KUB , US , CT ) , number-dimensions-localization-composition stone ( ) , existence hydronephrosis 3 . Operative data : Access fluoroscopy duration , total access duration , total fluoroscopy duration , operation duration , use double-J stent , preoperative complication 4 . Number previous ESWL seance , total duration ESWL , number shot ESWL ( ) 5 . Follow-up data : Urethral catheterization time , hospitalization time , need treatment stone-free , time full stone-free , duration removal double-J stent , existence residual stone ( ) , formation new stone ( ) , complication late period
DOC.criteria: Patients plan undergo PCNL due kidney stone Patients kidney stone < 2 cm Patients 18 65 year old Patients unregulated diabetes mellitus diabetic nephropathy Patients blood pressure high 140/80 mmHg despite use antihypertensive drug ( ) regularly Patients chronic renal failure need dialysis Patients prerenal , renal postrenal acute kidney failure last 6 month Patients acute pyelonephritis last 6 month Patients young 18 year old old 65 year old Patients kidney surgery last 3 month abnormal kidney function Patients ureteral stone plan undergo endoscopic stone treatment time Patients history corticosteroid use enrollment study previous 3 month Patients uncontrolled thyroid disease Patients disease rapid cell turnover ( like leukemia , lymphoma , etc . ) Patients whose operation terminate convert open surgery due reason Patients miss data
